concept.title: Campaigns
concept.shortdesc: Campaigns determine what content is displayed to whom (audience), where (locations), and when.

conbody.p: A campaign has a specific goal, which is tracked by metrics. To run, a campaign requires the matching of the visitor's context with the rules set in the campaign, and the delivery of content according to the technical constraints of the location's channel.

Sometimes campaigns are organized in programs (called portfolios in the Adobe Marketing Cloud). Typically, campaign is used in a specific channel instead of a cross-channel campaign. This is due to the evolution of campaign management tools, which are very channel-oriented.
